tool_description:
Find All Available Permanent Card Offers and Benefits from Indian Banks
Also, Get the recommended card based on the expenses
name: Credit Card Offers Stack
title: Credit Card Offers Stack

api_list.name: /staticCardDetails/getAll
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://credit-card-offers-stack.p.rapidapi.com/staticCardDetails/getAll"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "credit-card-offers-stack.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://credit-card-offers-stack.p.rapidapi.com/staticCardDetails/getAll"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "credit-card-offers-stack.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
